name: Gun-tender
description:
Gun-tender is a short game about not so independent bartender, who serves drinks but also death in their bar.
A satirical portrayal of contemporary characters in their animal form.

This game was made as a part of Lost Cartridge gamejam.
It's a ZX Spectrum look alike game.

Instructions:
The game is controlled by keyboard - menu by numbers 0 - 3
Other parts of game are controlled by commands:
SAY ANOTHER / NOTHING (another - ask a customer if they want another drink, nothing - let a customer leave in peace)
GIVE DRINK / POISON (drink - give thirsty customer a drink, poison - give thirsty customer poison)
FIRE GUN (you know the drill)
OPEN LIST and OPEN (open list - open hit list, open - open info on customer)
QUIT (go to main menu)
